item.title: 钢铁是特朗普关税思想的核心
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统将于本周开始征收钢铝关税，这是在不断扩大的保护主义政策拼图中插入的最新一块。【原文：The steel and aluminum tariffs President Donald Trump is due to impose starting this week are the latest piece being inserted into an expanding protectionist policy jigsaw puzzle.】

item.title: 特朗普的化石燃料野心取决于天然气
item.description:
疲软的原油价格削弱了钻探更多石油的动力，但液化天然气则不同。【原文：

Weak crude prices have eroded the incentive to drill for more oil, but LNG is a different story.

】

item.title: 宏观逆风抵消特朗普推动力，加密货币跌势加深
item.description: 周一，加密货币价格继续下滑，原因是关税战紧张局势升级以及美联储进一步降息的前景黯淡，抵消了唐纳德-特朗普总统上周宣布的一波支持加密货币的言论。【原文：Cryptocurrency prices extended their slide on Monday as escalating tariff war tensions and diminishing prospects of further Federal Reserve rate cuts offset a wave of pro-crypto announcements from President Donald Trump last week.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦近一年来首次维持关键利率不变
item.description: 巴基斯坦出人意料地在近一年来首次维持基准利率不变，政策制定者强调了全球贸易中断和食品价格波动给通胀带来的风险。【原文：Pakistan unexpectedly held its benchmark rate for the first time in almost a year, with policymakers flagging risks to inflation from global trade disruptions and volatile food prices.】

item.title: 欧洲几乎没有替代马斯克 "星链 "的好选择
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是我们改版后的每日时事通讯，由彭博社全球记者提供有关科技商业的报道和分析。今天，吉莉安-多伊奇（Jillian Deutsch）报道了欧洲因担心埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）可能撤回星链（Starlink）卫星通信服务而面临的困境。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our revamped daily newsletter with reporting and analysis about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Jillian Deutsch reports on the dilemma facing Europe over concerns that Elon Musk might pull back on the Starlink satellite communications service.】

item.title: 政策动荡之际，华尔街出现下调美国经济增长评级的声音
item.description: 我是克里斯-安斯蒂，波士顿的经济编辑。今天我们将关注各大银行下调美国经济增长评级的一系列事件。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net，或通过 @economics 在 X 上与我们联系。如果您还没有注册接收本新闻通讯，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Chris Anstey, an economics editor in Boston. Today we’re looking at a series of US growth downgrades at major banks. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net or get in touch on X via @economics. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 美国鸡蛋短缺，巴西鸡蛋出口将增加近一倍
item.description: 由于美国爆发了有史以来最严重的高致病性禽流感，导致鸡蛋短缺，巴西正准备扩大出口。【原文：Brazil is preparing to boost exports as the US faces a shortage of eggs due to the worst-ever outbreak of highly pathogenic avian influenza.】

item.title: 可可产量缩减，加纳第四季度经济下滑
item.description: 由于工业活动几乎停滞，可可行业再次萎缩，加纳第四季度的经济增长速度为一年多来最慢。【原文：Ghana’s economy grew at the slowest pace in more than a year in the fourth quarter, as industrial activity almost stalled and the cocoa sector shrank again.】

item.title: RWE 在特朗普的可再生能源反击中裁减美国海上风电岗位
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对可再生能源持批评态度促使德国能源公司 RWE AG 去年暂停投资后，该公司正在辞退在美国的海上风电员工。【原文：German energy firm RWE AG is letting go of offshore wind employees in the US after President Donald Trump’s critical stance on renewables prompted the company to pause investments last year.】

item.title: Rocket 同意以 17.5 亿美元收购房地产经纪公司 Redfin
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社查阅的一份声明，Rocket Cos.已同意收购Redfin Corp.，该交易对房地产挂牌网站的估值为17.5亿美元。【原文：Rocket Cos. has agreed to buy Redfin Corp. in a deal that valued the real estate listing site at $1.75 billion, according to a statement reviewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: 日本石场敦促企业和工会提高工资水平
item.description: 日本首相石破茂（Shigeru Ishiba）呼吁工会和公司提高工人工资，而本周他们的年度薪酬谈判也将进入白热化阶段。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba called on unions and companies to boost workers’ pay, just as their annual pay negotiations are set to heat up this week.】

item.title: 卡齐米尔称欧洲央行需对下一步利率措施保持开放心态
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员彼得-卡齐米尔（Peter Kazimir）表示，在面对持续存在的通胀风险时，欧洲中央银行需要对下一步行动持开放态度。【原文：The European Central Bank needs to have an open mind on its next steps as it confronts persisting inflation risks, according to Governing Council member Peter Kazimir.】

item.title: 野村认为随着投资者削减风险敞口，S&P 500 指数暴跌风险较低
item.description: 野村证券（Nomura Securities）跨资产策略师查理-麦克利戈特（Charlie McElligott）认为，S&P 500 指数的可控跌幅降低了市场出现更大规模崩溃的几率。【原文：The S&P 500 Index’s controlled decline is reducing the odds of a wider market meltdown, according to Nomura Securities cross-asset strategist Charlie McElligott.】

item.title: 乌克兰声称萨马拉地区的俄罗斯石油公司炼油厂遭到袭击
item.description: 乌克兰声称对俄罗斯萨马拉地区俄罗斯石油公司（Rosneft PJSC）拥有的一家炼油厂进行了袭击，这是对一个关键行业几乎每天都在进行的袭击。【原文：Ukraine claimed a strike on an oil refinery owned by Rosneft PJSC in Russia’s Samara region, continuing attacks on a key industry on almost on a daily basis.】

item.title: 匈牙利预算缺口因支付零售债券利息而急剧扩大
item.description: 匈牙利 2 月份的预算赤字飙升，这是总理维克托-欧尔班政府面临财政挑战的最新迹象。【原文：Hungary’s budget deficit soared in February in the latest indication of the fiscal challenges facing Prime Minister Viktor Orban’s government.】

item.title: 股市下滑表明经济衰退担忧加剧
item.description: 市场数据截至美国东部时间上午 06:14。根据供应商协议，市场数据可能会有所延迟。【原文：Market data as of 06:14 am EST. Market data may be delayed depending on provider agreements.】

item.title: 为什么肥胖症药物革命仍在进行中？
item.description:
Wegovy和Zepbound需求旺盛，但供应问题和有限的保险范围限制了人们获得价格昂贵的药物。【原文：

Demand for Wegovy and Zepbound is booming, but supply issues and limited insurance coverage have curtailed access to the pricey medications.

】

item.title: 迪士尼乐园负责人认为《堡垒之夜》是其未来的关键
item.description:
艾格的潜在继任者约什-达马罗（Josh D'Amaro）正在投资 Epic Games 数字宇宙、新游轮和 "恶棍乐园"。【原文：

Josh D’Amaro, a potential Iger successor, is investing in an Epic Games digital universe as well as new cruise ships and “Villains Land.”

】

item.title: 挪威财富基金顾问警告美国可能阻碍反腐工作
item.description: 挪威1.8万亿美元主权财富基金的道德委员会警告说，美国反腐败立法的倒退很可能会使识别违反道德准则的企业变得更加困难。【原文：The ethics council for Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund warned that the rolling back of anti-corruption legislation in the US is likely to make it more difficult to identify businesses breaching ethical guidelines.】

item.title: 新加坡交易所将上市开放式比特币期货合约
item.description: 新加坡交易所（Singapore Exchange Ltd.）计划上市比特币永续期货，因为传统交易所正在深入推进加密货币衍生品市场。【原文：Singapore Exchange Ltd. plans to list Bitcoin perpetual futures as traditional exchanges push deeper into crypto derivative markets.】

item.title: BBVA 获得监管部门批准在西班牙向零售商提供加密货币服务
item.description: BBVA SA 已获得监管部门批准，在西班牙为加密资产提供托管和执行服务。【原文：BBVA SA has received regulatory approval to provide custody and execution services for crypto assets in Spain.】

item.title: 巴西亿万富豪家族竞购法国维拉利亚公司
item.description: 巴西亿万富翁莫雷拉-萨莱斯（Moreira Salles）家族正在竞购法国包装公司 Verallia SA，以帮助其一项重要投资更好地应对日益加剧的贸易紧张局势。【原文：Brazil’s billionaire Moreira Salles family is bidding to take over French packaging company Verallia SA to help one if its key investments better navigate rising trade tensions.】

item.title: 土耳其克孜勒布克度假村因拆除纠纷股价下跌
item.description: 土耳其房地产开发商 Kizilbuk 的股价在周一的伊斯坦布尔交易中暴跌，此前有报道称，一个部委办公室正在寻求拆除其位于度假胜地马尔马里斯的豪华房地产项目。【原文：Turkish property developer Kizilbuk’s shares slumped in Istanbul trading on Monday after reports emerged that a ministry office is seeking the demolition of its luxury property project in the resort town of Marmaris.】

item.title: 特朗普过渡言论引发经济衰退忧虑，国债上涨
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普关于美国经济 "转型期 "的言论加剧了人们对美国经济放缓可能指日可待的担忧，国债反弹。【原文：Treasuries rallied as President Donald Trump’s comments on “a period of transition” for the US economy added to concern that a slowdown could be just around the corner.】

item.title: 曾被寄予厚望的氢气公司成为北欧最新一家失败的绿色希望公司
item.description: Green Hydrogen Systems A/S 公司将进入重组程序，这是继去年瑞典的 Northvolt AB 公司因受创伤而倒闭之后，北欧地区最新一家倒闭的可持续能源公司。【原文：Green Hydrogen Systems A/S will go into a restructuring process, the latest sustainable energy company in the Nordic region to collapse, following last year’s traumatic demise of Sweden’s Northvolt AB.】

item.title: 华尔街开始反思对 2025 年 S&P 500 指数的夸张预测
item.description: 连续两年来，股票市场预言家们一次又一次地上调对 S&P 500 指数的展望，以跟上持续不断的涨势。【原文：For two consecutive years, stock-market prognosticators lifted their outlooks for the S&P 500 Index over and over again to keep up with an unrelenting rally.】

item.title: 沙特扎希德公司将与巴洛克世界公司股东重开谈判
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯的扎希德集团（Zahid Group）将与南非 Barloworld 有限公司的股东重新开始谈判，此前该公司曾提出过一项收购要约。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Zahid Group will start fresh negotiations with the shareholders of South Africa’s Barloworld Ltd., after an initial acquisition offer was rejected.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚将经营从陷入困境的公司手中没收的棕榈种植园
item.description: 印度尼西亚政府接管了从一家面临贪污调查的公司手中没收的棕榈油种植园的管理权，这一举措可能会推广到其他陷入困境的商品生产基地。【原文：The Indonesian government took over management of palm oil plantations seized from a corporation facing a graft probe, under an initiative that may be extended to other troubled commodity-production sites.】

item.title: 中国猪肉生产商牧原被指考虑在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，全球最大的种猪和猪肉生产商之一--牧原食品股份有限公司正在考虑在香港第二次上市，这可能有助于该公司筹集至少 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Muyuan Foods Co., one of the world’s biggest pig breeders and pork producers, is considering a second listing in Hong Kong that may help it to raise at least $1 billion, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 普拉博沃要求打车公司为司机发放假日奖金
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托（Prabowo Subianto）下令，在印尼即将迎来一年一度的最大节日之际，包括 GoTo Group 和 Grab Holdings Ltd. 在内的打车公司必须向司机发放节日奖金。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto ordered ride-hailing firms including GoTo Group and Grab Holdings Ltd. to give holidays bonuses to their drivers as the country nears its biggest annual holiday.】
